it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class EndlessDeck<T extends Card>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Deck<T>
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.EndlessDeck<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of cards handled by the deck

    public class EndlessDeck<T extends Card>
extends Deck<T>
    An endless deck is a type of deck in which the used cards are reused when the deck becomes empty

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public T draw()
       throws EmptyDeckException
        Get the first card of the deck and remove from it. If the deck is empty but you have scrapped old cards, it will be recreated with that ones and give you the new first card.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Deck<T extends Card>
        Returns:
        the first card of the deck
        Throws:
        EmptyDeckException - if both the deck and the scraps are empty.

      • scrapCard

        public void scrapCard(T card)
        Scrap a card when used. It'll be used for the new deck
        Parameters:
        card - Card to be added to the scraps deck
